reviewText: great movie, full of historical information

Currently researching for a story set during the First World War, so an opportunity to actually see something reenacted by some of the men who were there couldn't be missed. Knowing the tragic end Whittlesey met in November of 1921, I can't help but wonder if having to relive those harrowing days during the filming of this movie contributed to his eventual suicide.
Fairly good film despite  the lack of professional filmmakers and actors who made it.
MY WIFE'S GRANDFATHER IS HERMAN BERGASSE
Interesting docudrama on the 77th Div. it's soldiers and actions in France. Not spectacular but for that time period, it's not bad.
